interests.CanAdd: Idan har yanzu ba za ka iya samun abin da kake nema ba, za ka iya ƙara sabon sha'awa a ƙasa:
interests.TrySynonyms: Shin ba ku gani ba? Gwada wasu alamu.

chat.flaggedForAdminReview: An tayi sakon da aka yi don dubawa. Matsa sake zuwa unflag.
chat.closeChatConfirm: Shin kuna tabbatar kuna so ku rufe wannan hira?
chat.notAllowedToJoinCall: Baka da izinin shiga wannan tattaunawar.

notifications.Streams\/relatedFrom\/*: An kara shi zuwa {{toTitle}} kamar yadda {{relationDisplayType}}

dialog.photoInstruction: Idan mutumin da ya bincika QR code yana gaban ku, ɗauki hoto daga gare su
dialog.title: Gayyata
dialog.orInvite: Ko kuma kiran mutane ta amfani da:

email.subject: Hey, duba wannan
email.PleaseVisitLink: Da fatan a ziyarci mahaɗin da ke biyowa:

sms.content: An gayyace ku zuwa {{title}}. Da fatan a latsa {{url}}

notice.text: An gayyatar ku. {{ClickOrTap}} nan don karɓa da shiga.

mobile.alert: An aiko da kira daga lambarmu, wanda abokanka ba su gane ba tukuna. Biyo tare da rubutun sauri don sanar da su gayyatar ya zo daga gare ku, ya umarce su su danna mahaɗin.
mobile.confirm: An aiko da kira daga lambarmu, wanda abokanka ba su gane ba tukuna. Kuna so ku bi ta hanyar rubutun sauri don sanar da su cewa gayyatar ya zo daga gare ku, yana tambayar su su danna mahaɗin.
mobile.check: Hakanan, na aika muku da kira ga {{app}} app. Da fatan a duba sms dinku kuma danna mahadar!
mobile.CheckYourMobile: Da fatan za a duba SMS kuma a bi umarni!

email.alert: Ana aika da kira daga yankinmu, wanda abokanka ba su gane ba tukuna. Biyo tare da rubutun sauri don sanar da su gayyatar ya zo daga gare ku, ya umarce su su danna mahaɗin.
email.confirm: Ana aika da kira daga yankinmu, wanda abokanka ba su gane ba tukuna. Kuna so ku bi ta hanyar rubutun sauri don sanar da su cewa gayyatar ya zo daga gare ku, yana tambayar su su danna mahaɗin.
email.subject: Shin kun samo kira?
email.body: Hakanan, na aika muku da kira ga {{app}} app. Da fatan a duba adireshin imel ku kuma danna mahadar a can!
email.CheckYourEmail: Da fatan za a bincika imel ɗinku kuma ku bi umarnin!

webInstructionsDialog.permissionDenied: An ba da izini ga {{kind}} ya hana. Don amfani da shi don Allah bi waɗannan matakan:
webInstructionsDialog.point1: Je zuwa "Saiti" -> "Ci gaba" -> "Sirri da tsaro" -> "Saiti shafin" -> "Kamara" ko "Saitunan yanar gizo" -> "Makirufo"

webIosInstructionsDialog.permissionDenied: An ba da izini ga {{kind}} ya hana. Da fatan za a sake buɗe wannan shafin kuma tabbatar da samun dama ga {{kind}} don shiga taron.

androidInstructionsDialog.permissionDenied: An ba da izini ga {{kind}} ya hana. Don amfani da shi don Allah bi waɗannan matakan:
androidInstructionsDialog.point1: Je zuwa Saitunan ku na Android

iosInstructionsDialog.permissionDenied: An ba da izini ga {{kind}} ya hana. Don amfani da shi don Allah bi waɗannan matakan:

notices.youStoppedFbLive: Ka dakatar da yada wannan kiran a Facebook
notices.linkCopiedToCb: An lika hanyar haɗi zuwa allon rubutu
notices.codeCopiedToCb: Lambar da aka kwafa zuwa allo

Streams\/resource.description: rafi don sarrafa damar amfani da hanya da kuma aika sakonni game da sabuntawa

Streams\/task.description: don karɓar sabuntawa game da ci gaba akan wani aiki

Streams\/experience.description: sanannen masani ne ga membobin wata al'umma
Streams\/experience.displayType: Kwarewa ta yau da kullun ga membobin wata al'umma

Streams\/greeting.description: gaisuwa da wanda mai amfani zai iya gabatar da kansu

Streams\/album.description: kundi wanda yake da alaƙa da kafofin watsa labarai daban-daban

Streams\/category.description: rukuni wanda za'a iya danganta wasu koguna

Streams\/participating.description: Kogunan suna da alaƙa / basu da alaƙa da wannan lokacin da mai amfani ya shiga / ganye

Streams\/interest.description: wakiltar sha'awar mai amfani a wani takamaiman taken

Streams\/incoming.description: manufa don saƙonnin da wasu masu amfani suka aiko

Streams\/chat.description: tattaunawa tsakanin masu amfani, tare da tarihi

participating.AreYouSureRemoveIdentifier: An tabbatar an cire wannan mai gano?
participating.AreYouSureUnsubscribeIdentifier: Ka tabbata ka fitar da wannan ma'aikacin? Zai kashe sanarwa ga wannan mai gano.
participating.AreYouSureUnsubscribeDevice: An tabbata an cire wannan na'urar? Zai kashe sanarwa a wannan na'urar.
